episode.title: Train v. Campaign Clean Water, Inc.

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In a related case, 73-1378, Train against Campaign Clean Water Incorporated.

I have the opinion to announce for the Court and for reasons stated in that opinion the judgment of the Court of Appeals is vacated and the case is remanded to that Court for further proceedings consistent with this opinion and with the opinion in Train against the City of New York just announced by Mr. Justice White.
In this case, Mr. Justice Douglas concurs in the result.
